Introduction

DUSTIN-ON was a 3-member sub unit of the boy group DUSTIN. The unit consisted of members JJ, Bel, and Daon.

They debuted on August 17, 2020, with the mini album "0:Young" and its title track of the same name featuring HOLICS's Mina.

The sub-unit most likely disbanded following the disbandment of DUSTIN on May 24, 2021, and the absence of two of its members when the group was reformed.
